attributes.action: Issue service men/women an entitlement card that ensures they receive support.
attributes.additional_details: Issue service men/women an entitlement card that ensures they receive support from every aspect of the establishment including very low interest business loans, unlimited health care and positive discrimination for their housing needs.
attributes.background: Too many homeless ex-service men and women in need of government support, Lets honour those that are alive, the survivors of battle. The ones coming home a government who turns its back or provides woefully inadequate support after they leave the service.

rejection.details:
If you would like the Government to establish a ex-service people's recognition card you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230320

If you would like the Government to establish a special status for ex-service people with associated benefits you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226866
